title: Polish banks ranked by brand value in 2015
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 5 number of Banking Institutions.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 1594.0 is found at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski and the minimum is found at Millennium where Banking Institution is 295.0.
Banking Institution Millennium has 5.4 times less Brand value in million U.S. dollars than Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski which is the highest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Banking Institution, and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in each Banking Institution on the y axis.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski and lowest at Banking Institution Millennium.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand value in million U.S. dollars for 5 number of Banking Institutions.
The maximum Brand value in million U.S. dollars 1594.0 is found at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski and the minimum is found at Millennium where Banking Institution is 295.0.
Banking Institution Millennium has 5.4 times less Brand value in million U.S. dollars than Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Banking Institution in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski and lowest at Banking Institution Millennium.
The second highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Banking Institution Bank Pekao.
The maximum Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski has got 5.4 times higher Brand value in million U.S. dollars than the minimum Banking Institution Millennium.

The Banking Institution PKO Bank Polski has the highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars, followed by Bank Pekao, and Bank Zachodni WBK. Down to the Banking Institution Millennium which is the lowest.
The Banking Institution Millennium tends to be 1.95 percent lower than average.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is 4086.0 if we add up values of all Banking Institutions.
